mapper.select: /*retrieveEkgrpInfo 구매담당자 코드 목록*/ SELECT CODE ,CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T x WHERE x.DEL_FLAG ='0' and x.GROUP_CODE = '01' and x.REGION_CD = '01'
/*retrieveMeinsInfo 단위리스트 코드 목록*/ select CODE as CODE ,code+'/'+CODE_NM as CODE_NM from [dbo].[PR_CODEMASTER_T] where DEL_FLAG = 0 and GROUP_CODE = '04'
/*retrieveSaktoInfoList 계정 리스트 코드 목록*/ select CODE , CODE_NM from PR_CODEMASTER_T where del_flag = '0' and group_code = '10' and REGION_CD ='01' and CODE = #{code}
/*retrieveWerksInfo 플랜트 리스트 코드 목록*/ select CODE ,CODE_NM from [dbo].[PR_CODEMASTER_T] where DEL_FLAG = 0 and GROUP_CODE = '02' and REGION_CD ='01'

/*retrieveItemGubunInfo 사용 품목구분 목록*/ select SEQ_NUM CODE , S_CODE CODE_NM from PR_HELPMASTER_T x where x.USE_YN ='Y' and x.IS_MRO = 'N' and x.WERKS = '1010'
and x.KNTTP = 'P' and x.PSTYP = '' and x.USED_CODE ='S' /* and x.IZWEK != '01' */
and x.KNTTP = 'A' and x.PSTYP = ''
and x.KNTTP = 'P' and x.M_CODE ='투자'
and x.KNTTP = 'P' and x.PSTYP = '' and x.USED_CODE = 'O'
and x.S_CODE = #{sCode}
order by x.L_CODE, x.M_CODE, x.S_CODE asc

/* retrieveScodeInfo 조회 */ select a.SAKTO as sakto ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM PR_CODEMASTER_T y WHERE y.CODE = RTRIM(a.SAKTO) AND y.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND y.GROUP_CODE = '10' AND y.REGION_CD = a.region_cd ) as saktonm ,a.EKGRP as ekgrp ,a.WERKS as werks from [dbo].[PR_HELPMASTER_T] a where a.REGION_CD ='01' and a.BIZ_CD = '01' /* 추후 02, 03 등록 가능성 있음 */
and a.SEQ_NUM = #{sCode}
/*retrieveWaersInfo 금액단위리스트 코드 목록*/ select CODE as CODE ,code+'/'+CODE_NM as CODE_NM from [dbo].[PR_CODEMASTER_T] where DEL_FLAG = 0 and GROUP_CODE = '20'
